name: Box Master 1
description:
Box Master 1

A classic remake of the game Sokoban with 8-bit graphics and nice chiptune music.

Features : 

  • 10 levels
  • game effects
  • character animation
  • random chiptune music
  • 8 bit pixelated graphics

    • How to play : 

  • escape : exit game
  • spacebar : start game
  • r : restart level
  • arrow keys : move the player
